title: Official Government website redirecting to betting websites.
selftext:
Example : See screenshot (Purple Coloured are the ones in question)

It can trap any layman as its human tendency to seek easy provit and that .gov.in at the end is not helping.

I am not on twitter , so anyone who is should tweet and appeal the respective authorities to take corrective measure.

​

(View the domain when it redirects ; For some reason if I directly open this url it gives error but when opening from google search it opens a betting site , hence the only way that I can see the link is to see the URL when redirecting or see the SS below)

​

https://preview.redd.it/iueihw1bbcza1.png?width=2689&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=0b89b8c417e87f7e60c953a4fca5730c8ecacd08
comments:
Tl;DR : Website's server is possibly backdoor-ed.

Theory:

Clearly there are hidden pages on the server which is indexed by Google's search here.

Seems like the websites are running on a similar backend network made by the same organisation. The organisation is using these hidden pages to redirect to their sources of income. (Betting site)

The domain is owned and controlled by the government, no doubt. But the server is not (even if they do, there is hidden code from when the organisation made the server). The betting site checks for redirects to prevent anyone actually trying to use those websites.
This is a Fricking joke ðŸ¤£ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³
Government wants you to make a team on dream11.
There was something similar on some czech government websites which iirc would redirect to porn
Man, I really think that govt should hire some  good web developers man the govt websites today looks shit and work likes shit ( except some )
Well you know what more can you expect from government led and managed by bloody banias from the G state
